channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- AGCA
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- AGCA

item.title: CVE-2024-2907|2024-04-25T05:00:01.952Z -- Unknown -- AGCA
item.description: The AGCA WordPress plugin before 7.2.2 does not sanitise and escape some of its settings, which could allow high privilege users such as admin to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed (for example in multisite setup).
